text: Volya (Bulgarian: Воля meaning "Will"; previously known as Dnes and the Liberal Alliance) is a political party in Bulgaria. It was founded on 15 July 2007 by businessman Veselin Mareshki. The name Volya was adapted on 28 November 2016. The party is seen as having a pro-Russian stance, and is also Eurosceptic (meaning they are critical of the European Union). It is also nationalistic and populist. Their best performance in the parliamentary election was in 2017, where they received around 4% of the national vote and won 12 out of 240 seats. == Performances == === Parliamentary elections === Election # of seats won # of total votes % of popular vote Seat change % change 2009 0 / 240 — — — — 2013 0 / 240 8,873 0.25% 0 0.25% 2014 0 / 240 — — — — 2017 12 / 240 145,637 4.15% 12 4.15% == References == == Other websites == * Official website (Bulgarian) Category:2007 establishments in Europe Category:21st-century establishments in Bulgaria Category:Political parties in Bulgaria
title: Volya Movement
